      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getCombinationFlowcellKit()
      Gets all the combinations of flowcell ID and kit number.
      Return a Map object, key is FlowcellIdKitNumber, value is CFG file name.
      Output example: {FLO-FLG001SQK-PSK004=dna_r9.4.1_450bps_hac, FLO-FLG001SQK-LWP001=dna_r9.4.1_450bps_hac, FLO-MIN106SQK-DCS109=dna_r9.4.1_450bps_hac, ...}

      • getCombinationFlowcellKit

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getCombinationFlowcellKit()
        Gets all the combinations of flowcell ID and kit number.
        Return a Map object, key is FlowcellIdKitNumber, value is CFG file name.
        Output example: {FLO-FLG001SQK-PSK004=dna_r9.4.1_450bps_hac, FLO-FLG001SQK-LWP001=dna_r9.4.1_450bps_hac, FLO-MIN106SQK-DCS109=dna_r9.4.1_450bps_hac, ...}
        Returns:
        a map with all the combinations of flowcell ID and kit number.

      • getBarcodeKits

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getBarcodeKits()
        Gets all barcode kits.
        Returns:
        an Array List with all barcode kits.

      • getQstat

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getQstat()
        Gets the result from the qstat command.
        Returns:
        ArrayList with the result from qstat command.
